hero.title: Introduction
hero.large_description: <small-text>Hello! My name is <bold-text>Alessandro Cídney</bold-text> and I am a</small-text> <giant-text>Web and Front-End Developer</giant-text>
hero.small_description: I have over 3 years of experience creating websites, interfaces, and robust and efficient systems. My main mission is to help companies and clients achieve their goals and objectives while continuously growing professionally.

santo_id.title: Santo iD
santo_id.description: Platform for analyzing, validating, and extracting information from documents using artificial intelligence and machine learning.

santo_ai.title: Santo AI
santo_ai.description: Assistant based on generative AI, with various features such as text, image, and code generation.

santo_id_saude.title: Santo iD Health
santo_id_saude.description: New version of the Santo iD platform focused on processing documents and information related to the healthcare sector.

about_me.title: About me
about_me.subtitle: Get to know my story
about_me.content: My name is Alessandro Cídney, and I am a web and front-end developer with over 3 years of experience contributing to the development of several systems and websites.<line-break></line-break>Throughout my career, I have worked alongside multiple front-end and back-end developers, machine learning engineers, designers, and stakeholders, always aiming to implement the best solutions to meet client demands and user needs.<line-break></line-break>Over the course of my journey, I worked on several projects, with the three main ones being large projects at SantoDigital: Santo iD, an automated document analysis and information processing system; Santo AI, a robust AI assistant with multiple features; and Santo iD Health, a version of Santo iD focused on serving clients in the healthcare sector, with several features tailored to that area.<line-break></line-break>In addition, I also contributed to the implementation of pages and improvements across various client systems, intranets, and chatbots.<line-break></line-break>Finally, I assisted in the analysis and development of prototypes and designs using Figma, as well as supervising junior developers and interns, performing code reviews, providing guidance, and always promoting best development practices.<line-break></line-break>What do you think about working together on your next project and taking it to the next level?

description_list.item_1: Participation in the implementation of more than 30 pages and hundreds of features across 5 large projects, contributing to the achievement of 100% of the semiannual goals throughout the entire period of the role;
description_list.item_2: Creation of 2 integration SDKs for complex company systems, enabling faster integration of services and products with the systems of 3 major clients;
description_list.item_3: Implementation of several improvements and updates in CI/CD, accelerating the deployment of applications for 5 large and complex projects;
description_list.item_4: Commitment to bug fixing and improvement of project stability, carrying out the correction of hundreds of functional errors in internal systems;
description_list.item_5: Supervision and guidance of junior developers and interns, contributing to the training of 2 new professionals.

description_list.item_1: Modernization of the company’s products to a Micro Front-End Architecture, including the creation of a Single Sign-On (SSO) system and the migration and evolution of 3 large projects;
description_list.item_2: Development of more than 20 pages and hundreds of features across 3 large projects, contributing to the achievement of 100% of the semiannual goals throughout the entire period of the role;
description_list.item_3: Commitment to bug fixing and improvement of project stability, carrying out the correction of dozens of functional errors in internal systems.

description_list.item_1: Participation in the implementation of improvements on dozens of company product pages, contributing to the enhancement of 3 large products;
description_list.item_2: Contribution to the complete redesign of one of the company’s main products, promoting dozens of UI/UX improvements in collaboration with professional designers.
